# Networking Docs

## Networking

- [Network programming](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/overview.md): Learn about various networking approaches for .NET app development.
- [Network availability](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/network-info.md): Learn how to detect changes in network availability and ping a host with .NET.
- [IPv6 overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/ipv6-overview.md): Learn about the IPv6 protocol and how it differs from IPv4.

## WebSockets

- [WebSockets support](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/websockets.md): Learn how to web sockets with the ClientWebSockets in .NET.

## Children

- [Http](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/http/llms.txt)
- [Quic](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/quic/llms.txt)
- [Sockets](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/sockets/llms.txt)
- [Telemetry](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/networking/telemetry/llms.txt)
